website_summaries.verdict: A traditional chain lock covered with a protective fabric sleeve.
pros: 7 millimeter chain width and 85 centimeter length
Covered in a ABUS printed sleeve to keep paint protected
cons: The fabric sleeve can come loose and make locking the chain frustrating

customer_reviews.title: Lazy thieves will not get your bike without some extra effort.
customer_reviews.text: Great lock that should make lazy thieves work harder. Maybe people who still bikes should get a real job and contribute to society in a positive way.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Questionable security.
customer_reviews.text: I have lived and bicycled in New York City my whole life. I was so impressed with the convenience and light weight of the smaller version of this lock, that I purchased the 880 model with great confidence. My bike was stolen the second day I used this lock. I am positive that I locked it properly. The bike rack it was locked to was intact. I have no explanations. All I can say is that for New York, get the hardened chain with heavy mini lock like those by Kryptonite or OnGuard. At the very least a combination of strong mini U-locks.
customer_reviews.author: RFD

customer_reviews.title: Bike theft is pretty high where we live
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this lock for my 14 year olds bike (that cost around $500). We opted to get one with a key so we could keep the other key for emergencies. Bike theft is pretty high where we live, hoping this chain will do the job. As of now it is working out great, the length is perfect and we were not concerned with weight of the chain since he uses the bike for short rides around the island and getting to work.
customer_reviews.author: R Spence

customer_reviews.title: Great security bike chain
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this chain to keep his bike locked up at school, home and work. It's probably not meant for high crime areas like NYC but it works for our area. It's lighter in weight than the other competitors but still very strong and sturdy. This is a plus when you have to throw it in your backpack on your trip. The sleeve stays in place too so it doesn't scratch up your bike. Overall it's a really great chain with a level 8 security rating.
customer_reviews.author: J. McClung

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it. perfect size for my use
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. perfect size for my use. The locking mechanism is high quality and smooth to operate this has replaced a kryptonite chain( same size ) which the lock was vey poor quality, sticky, impossible to open and close, even with a lot of patience and care. Please invest in a Abus you will not waste your time and money !
customer_reviews.author: Tiguan

customer_reviews.title: Strong stuff
customer_reviews.text: Light enough to transport but good enough for the casual thief (not the New York variety!).
customer_reviews.author: BallaghMan

customer_reviews.title: WARNING - ZERO STARS!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t bother!!! Had this lock a couple of weeks and just had my bike stolen. They cut it clean off!! I only gave it 1 star as you can’t leave a review with 0. (Photo was take in the taxi I’m in as I no longer have a bike)
customer_reviews.author: Louis Driver

customer_reviews.title: Solid, high-quality lock
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HEAVY - my bike will never get stolen!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bagot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a bit shorter than my other one, but hefty lock!
customer_reviews.author: jkh

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE. HORRIBLE. HORRIBLE.
customer_reviews.text: MY GIANT ROAD BIKE WAS STOLEN. SNIPPED OFF LIKE PRUNING A BRANCH.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

product_meta.title: Abus Steel O Chain 880/85 Chain Lock
product_meta.description: FEATURES of the Abus Steel O Chain 880/85 Chain Lock 7 mm square chain with fabric sleeve to prevent damage of the bicycle's paintwork The chain, the case as well as supporting elements of the locking mechanism are made of special hardened steel ABUS automatic cylinder with drill-protection and user-friendly reversible key Two keys are supplied with the lock SPECIFICATIONS of the Abus Steel O Chain 880/85 Chain Lock Chain diameter: 7 mm Chain Length: 85 cm Weight: 1600 g
feature_bullets: Pinned fabric sleeve prevents paint damage
